ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( If_yes_what_is_the_name_of_Citrix_Rep__c ="", ISPICKVAL( Already_work_with_Citrix_on_this_Oppty__c , "Yes") ) , TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If "Already work with Citrix on this Oppty.?" is Yes, then "If yes, what is the name of Citrix Rep?" field must be specified.
